StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidateAddressByPersonId]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonID int ) AS
DECLARE @charType char(1)
SELECT -1 AS [ID] ,[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,CASE [ADDRESS_TYPE] WHEN 'C' THEN 1 WHEN 'H' THEN 2 END as [ADDRESS_TYPE] ,[STREET_ADDRESS] ,[STREET_ADDRESS_2] ,[CITY_CODE] ,[COUNTY_CODE] ,[STATE_CODE] ,[ZIPCODE] FROM [dbo].[CANDIDATE_ADDRESS] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonId
